duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all assigned division’s footwear samples and showrooms, coordinating sample requests, shipments, and maintenance.
Organize and maintain the showroom walls and storage dress shops, ensuring the correct and most up-to-date samples are displayed.
Coordinate sample shipments and distributions for domestic and international conferences, trade shows, and photo shoots.
Distribute incoming development, fit, national account, and confirmation samples to the appropriate recipients.
Work with the product team to coordinate the use of corporate and special samples for account meetings and presentations.
Dress and prepare samples for photography, as well as handle the invoicing and tracking of samples sent for photography.
Maintain logs and track samples in the division, providing reports for merchandisers and management.
Perform additional rotational coordinator duties and cover various responsibilities as required.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
